text: Laputa: Castle in the Sky , released as Castle in the Sky in North America, is a 1986 Japanese animated fantasy adventure movie. It was written and directed by Hayao Miyazaki. It was produced by Isao Takahata, animated by Studio Ghibli, and distributed by the Toei Company. In voice acting roles, the original Japanese version stars Mayumi Tanaka, Keiko Yokozawa, Kotoe Hatsui, and Minori Terada. Category:1986 animated movies Category:Japanese fantasy movies
title: Castle in the Sky
